import React from "react"; import "./BigCategories.css"; import { Col, Row, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FaFish, FaPizzaSlice } from "react-icons/fa"; import { GiChickenOven } from "react-icons/gi"; import { TbMeat } from "react-icons/tb"; import { GiRopeCoil } from "react-icons/gi"; import { TbCheese } from "react-icons/tb"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const BigCategories = ({ colorWines, typeWines, grapeWines }) => { const [deviceSize, changeDeviceSize] = useState(window.innerWidth); useEffect(() => { const resizeW = () => changeDeviceSize(window.innerWidth); window.addEventListener("resize", resizeW); // Update the width on resize return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", resizeW); }); const [redMeat, setReadMeat] = useState({ Type: "", Color: "", Grape: "", Year: "", }); const [whiteMeat, setWhiteMeat] = useState({ Type: "", Color: "", Grape: "", Year: "", }); const [fish, setFish] = useState({ Type: "", Color: "", Grape: "", Year: "", }); const [cheece, setCheece] = useState({ Type: "", Color: "", Grape: "", Year: "", }); const [pasta, setPasta] = useState({ Type: "", Color: "", Grape: "", Year: "", }); return (
